title: Landing Page for Comfort Haven
description: Responsive HTML/CSS layout for the online furniture store Comfort Haven
post: Comfort Haven is a concept landing page website designed by Priscila Daniel for a Furniture company. It is a single page website that has some interesting sections such as the Hero section, Explore Now button, customer testimonial, etc.
Comfort Haven Sections
1. This section is the header section and holds the logo, menu, and navigation links to other parts of the website.
2. Hero Section: This section highlights what the site is about with some texts and image properly aligned.
3. Featured Collection: The feature collection showcases some of the featured products available in various categories. It includes three photos and a video.
4. Recommended Section: This section shows clients/customers recommended product based on their piece and discounts.
5. Top Picks Section: This section shows the favorite products picked by customers. These products are ranked by their star ratings
6. Testimonial Section: This section shows the response from customers who bought and used the company products.
7. Newsletter section: This section is where users can enter the email and subscribe to newsletter updates from Comfort Haven.
8. Footer Section: The footer section is a combination of menu links, contact information, and social media icon.
Technology Used to Build Comfort Haven
The following technology was used to build this landing page:
1. HTML
2. Tailwind CSS
3. JavaScript
The codes for this project is available in my GitHub repo and if you want to see the live version, you can use any of the buttons below.
